text: Scott Darling (born December 22, 1988) is an American ice hockey goaltender. He currently plays for the Chicago Blackhawks of the National Hockey League (NHL). ==Career== Before playing in the NHL, Darling played 2 years of college hockey with the University of Maine Black Bears. He was drafted 153rd overall by the Phoenix Coyotes in the 2007 NHL Entry Draft. On July 1, 2014, he was signed to a one-year deal as a free agent by the Chicago Blackhawks. On October 26, 2014, Darling made his first start in goal for the Blackhawks. He also recorded his first NHL win in the same game, winning 2–1. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American ice hockey goaltenders Category:Charlotte Checkers (2010–) players Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Hamilton Bulldogs (AHL) players Category:Milwaukee Admirals players Category:Rockford IceHogs (AHL) players Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:ECHL players Category:United States Hockey League players
title: Scott Darling
